verses.roman:
'kṛṣṇa' bali' paḍe sei mahāprabhura pāya
prabhu śrī-caraṇa dila tāṅhāra māthāya

synonyms: kṛṣṇa bali'—chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; paḍe—falls down; sei—that Vijulī Khān; mahāprabhura pāya—at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śrī-caraṇa dila—placed His foot; tāṅhāra māthāya—on his head.
translation: Vijulī Khān also fell down at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and the Lord placed His foot on his head.
